## Course Overview

This course covers observational research methods using R with the OHDSI/HADES ecosystem.

## Sessions

### Session 1: The R Workflow

Environment, dependencies, and data foundations.

- [Slides](slides/01_r-workflow/slides.html)
- [Module: R Foundations](modules/01_r-workflow/r-foundations.html)

### Session 2: Data Workflow

Tools, types, and data management with DatabaseConnector.

- [Slides](slides/02_data-workflow/slides.html)
- [Module: Data Workflow](modules/02_data-workflow/data-workflow.html)

### Session 3: Git, Databases, and OHDSI's SQL Strategy

Version control, remote databases, and how OHDSI handles SQL across platforms.

- [Slides](slides/03_ohdsi-basics/slides.html)
- [Module: Git, SQL, and the OMOP CDM](modules/03_ohdsi-basics/ohdsi-basics.html)

### Session 4: The OMOP CDM and Cohort Definitions

Building cohort logic, inspecting JSON/SQL definitions, and diagnostics intuition.

- [Slides](slides/04_cohorts/slides.html)
- [Module: Cohort Definitions and Diagnostics](modules/04_cohorts/cohorts.html)

### Session 5: Introduction to Strategus

Designing and executing study pipelines with analysis specifications and execution settings.

- [Slides](slides/05_strategus-intro/slides.html)
- [Module: Introduction to Strategus](modules/05_strategus-intro/strategus-intro.html)

### Session 6: Strategus Recap + GiBleed Demo

Brief recap of Strategus foundations, then a concrete demo using Eunomia GiBleed.

- [Slides](slides/06_strategus-gibleed-demo/slides.html)
- [Example: Build Analysis Specification](modules/06_strategus-gibleed-demo/createStrategusAnalysisSpecification.R)
- [Example: Execute Study](modules/06_strategus-gibleed-demo/executeStudy.R)

### Session 7: Population-Level Estimation with CohortMethod

Propensity scores, the CohortMethodModule, and diagnostics for comparative cohort studies.

- [Slides](slides/07_cohort-method/slides.html)
